title: Jessie Hearts NYC
description: Jessie's just arrived in New York, hoping to forget about her awful ex. New Yorker Finn is in love with his best friend's girlfriend. They might be perfect together, but in a city of eight million people, will they ever find each other?A breezy summer rom-com, with oodles of New York glamour. (Bookseller)
author: Keris Stainton
